original_text: Just then his disciples came back. They marveled that he was talking with a woman, but no one said, “What do you seek?” or, “Why are you talking with her?”
korean_text: 이 때에 제자들이 돌아와서 예수께서 여자와 말씀하시는 것을 이상히 여겼으나 무엇을 구하시나이까 어찌하여 그와 말씀하시나이까 묻는 자가 없더라

sentences.original_text: Just then his disciples came back.
They marveled that he was talking with a woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그가 한 여자와 대화하고 있는 것을 이상하게 여겼다.

sentences.original_text: or, “Why are you talking with her?”
